${ModID}:AstronomicalClock.NAME: Astronomical Clock
${ModID}:AstronomicalClock.FLAVOR: Once remarkably precise, the clock's movements are erratic and confused.
${ModID}:AstronomicalClock.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: The clock's internal mechanisms haven't survived the continuous looping.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn #b2, draw #b1 card and gain [E] .

${ModID}:AmberGemstone.NAME: Amber Gemstone
${ModID}:AmberGemstone.FLAVOR: A strangely comforting gem. It fills you with a refreshing clarity.
${ModID}:AmberGemstone.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: Her necklace looked just like this. How did it get here?
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a #yDazed would be created, create a random card instead. It becomes #yEthereal.

${ModID}:WindUpButterfly.NAME: Wind-Up Butterfly
${ModID}:WindUpButterfly.FLAVOR: Trying not to cry- It's the first time I say goodbye.
${ModID}:WindUpButterfly.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: When am I going to lose you?
DESCRIPTIONS: If you #yExhaust a card during your turn, draw #b1 additional card at the start of your next turn.

${ModID}:Raincoat.NAME: Raincoat
${ModID}:Raincoat.FLAVOR: I never believed in moral dilemmas- But I guess you're an exception.
${ModID}:Raincoat.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: This would have been helpful. We could have danced forever.

${ModID}:Everything.NAME: Everything
${ModID}:Everything.FLAVOR: You slammed the book shut mere moments after opening it, the information contained inside overwhelming.
${ModID}:Everything.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: You want to know if you'll ever see her again, but you're not strong enough to look.

${ModID}:InvertedHourglass.NAME: Inverted Hourglass
${ModID}:InvertedHourglass.FLAVOR: The sand in this hourglass trickles backwards through time, appearing to travel against gravity. What has the sand seen?
${ModID}:InvertedHourglass.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: A trinket like this resided in the center of the Great Hall.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of combat, shuffle #b3 #yDazed into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Locket.NAME: Locket
${ModID}:Locket.FLAVOR: The pictures in here hold no meaning, and yet, some significance.
${ModID}:Locket.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: You need to stop looking. Or else you'll never continue fighting.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add a random card to your hand. It is #yEthereal.

${ModID}:PurpleBow.NAME: Purple Bow
${ModID}:PurpleBow.FLAVOR: It's not yours. But it came back to you.
${ModID}:PurpleBow.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: Tears fill your eyes as your time together comes back to you.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply #b1 #y${ModID}:Foretold to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:PairOfGears.NAME: Pair of Gears
${ModID}:PairOfGears.FLAVOR: The gears spin around each other slowly. Despite your efforts, you cannot stop them, nor speed them up.
${ModID}:PairOfGears.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: You sympathize these gears. Just like them, you cannot stop.
DESCRIPTIONS: After you draw your first hand each combat, add a random #yPower from your draw pile to your hand.

${ModID}:TheClockworkUniverse.NAME: The Clockwork Universe
${ModID}:TheClockworkUniverse.FLAVOR: Disregarded as useless by the Spire denizens, you know this is something much greater.
${ModID}:TheClockworkUniverse.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: A small fraction of your old influence. But you'll take what you can get.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yAstronomical #yClock. Take an additional turn after your first each combat.

${ModID}:ShatteredGlass.NAME: Shattered Glass
${ModID}:ShatteredGlass.FLAVOR: In the reflections of the glass, you see slightly different versions of yourself.
${ModID}:ShatteredGlass.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: I remember that. That hurt. Never again.
DESCRIPTIONS: Relic and potion rewards have #b2 choices of equal rarity.
